dashboard.top_products_des: A list of the top 5 products in terms of total sales and total profits
dashboard.top_sell_areas_des: A list of the top 5 sales areas in terms of total sales and total profits

areas.active_sell_area_des: Here is the information of the active sales area, showing the total sales and the total profit
areas.no_active_area: There is no active sales area
areas.no_active_area_des: If you don't have an active sales area, you can't sell any products
areas.alert_finalize_title: Are you sure you want to end the active sales area?
areas.alert_finalize_description: If you terminate the area, all information about the active area will be archived until it is deleted, this action cannot be undone
areas.area_create_description: Are you sure you want to create a new sales area?
areas.sell_area_des: The place where sales are made, add products to the sales box in order to make a sale
areas.sell_area_no_products: There are no products available to display in the sales area.
areas.no_sell_areas: There are no sales areas created
areas.area_delete_des: If you delete the sales area, all information about the area will be deleted, this includes all sales and statistics, this action cannot be undone.
areas.sell_area_info_des: All information related to the sales area, sales, and statistics
areas.sell_stats_products_des: List of all products sold in this sales area, with total sales by product and profit
